DOC.brief_summary: The present study aim initially test community dog walk intervention address individual , interpersonal community factor associate dog walking . The study conduct two city , Worcester Lowell , collaboration investigator UMass Medical School UMass-Lowell .
DOC.brief_title: A Community-based Social Networking Intervention Increase Walking Dog Owners
DOC.detailed_description: This group randomize trial 8 community Worcester Lowell ( 4 per city ) randomly assign 6-month dog walk intervention standard , self-help , print-based physical activity control condition . Dog owner ( N=120 ; 15 per community ) recruit . The intervention include social networking website , monthly newsletter , twice monthly neighborhood dog walk community event . The intervention : 1 ) educate owner benefit dog walk dog , 2 ) teach strategy regular dog walking , 3 ) teach dog walk tip provide dog training seminar , 4 ) promote self-monitoring goal set dog walking , 5 ) provide social networking opportunity dog owner 6 ) promote sense community via participation neighborhood dog walk community event . Intervention feasibility assess measure implementation success , include recruitment retention rate , website use , intervention satisfaction attendance neighborhood walk community event . Initial efficacy assess via change weekly step measure via pedometer baseline 6-months baseline .
DOC.criteria: Eligible participant dog good health consider household pet , Worcester Lowell resident , age > 21 year old home internet access . Participants cardiovascular disease , diabetes chronic health condition eligible permission PCP participate . Participants exclude follow : 1 . Inability unwillingness give inform consent 2 . Plans move area within study period 3 . Participated focus group developmental phase 4 . Another household member participate study 5 . Pregnant plan pregnancy next six month 6 . Condition inhibits exercise ( e.g. , unable walk unaided , walk 1/4 mile without stop ) 7 . Incapable engage physical activity assess Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire 8 . Selfreport engage > 150 minute moderate vigorous intensity physical activity per week . 9 . The participant 's dog history bite human receive rabies vaccination .
